title: Google Pixel 3 dropping calls since update...
content:
Since the recent update, my calls are continuing to drop constantly.  This is a bit frustrating when you are taking calls for a meeting and having to dial in again and again.  I have performed the following:

Factory reset
Rebooted the phone
Went into settings to ensure T-Mobile is the proper carrier selected

None of these options have worked for me so far.  I'm wondering if any Google Pixel 3 users are having the same experience.
